thread.section_title: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brushy Mountain Bee Farm | brushymountainbeefarm.com | 3 of 154
thread.title: CHARLES LILES
thread.title_full: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm reviewed by CHARLES LILES

author: CHARLES LILES
title: CHARLES LILES
text:
I have just started beekeeping. I order identical items from Brushy Mountain and 2 other companies. I received my items from all 3 Brushy Mountain arrived 1 day earlier and was a little bit cheaper but, the quality was much better. Every person I have talked to has been patient and took their time to help me. I never felt rushed. every time I order I check to see if they have what I want 1st.
I was also impressed that they take time to make videos at no cost to us. I highly recommend them without reservation.
